metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45887 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9.drivers/media/usb/ttusb-dec/ttusb_dec.c has a memory leak because of thelack of a dvb_frontend_detach call.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
